Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
The inbound delivery number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound delivery.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).
The associated line of the initial system partner telegram. If a delivery line is added within WAMAS, then this number is set to 0.
The line number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound delivery line.
Is the unique identification of a client.
The inbound order number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound order.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).

If this value is greater than 0, that means the inbound order line was created via interface, line number corresponds to the line number of the system partner.If this value is 0, this means this inbound order line has been created by WAMAS.
The line number is part of the unique identifier of the inbound order line.
